<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Список задач.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Задача пользователя.","required":["id","title","priority","status","createdAt","updatedAt"],"properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"Уникальный идентификатор задачи.","example":"1","readOnly":true},"title":{"type":"string","minLength":3,"description":"Заголовок задачи.","example":"Buy groceries"},"description":{"type":"string","description":"Подробное описание задачи."},"dueDate":{"type":"string","format":"date","description":"Дата дедлайна (без времени).","example":"2025-09-01"},"category":{"type":"string","description":"Категория задачи (Personal, Work, Health и т.п.).","example":"Work"},"priority":{"type":"string","enum":["low","medium","high"],"description":"Приоритет задачи.","title":"Priority"},"pomodoro":{"type":"integer","minimum":0,"description":"Фактически потраченные помидоры на задачу.\nМожет быть 0, если пока не работали над задачей.\n","example":2},"status":{"type":"string","enum":["pending","in_progress","completed","cancelled"],"description":"Статус задачи.","title":"TaskStatus"},"createdAt":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Дата и время создания задачи.","example":"2025-08-25T10:00:00Z","readOnly":true},"updatedAt":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Дата и время последнего обновления.","example":"2025-08-25T10:00:00Z","readOnly":true},"completedAt":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Время завершения задачи (когда статус впервые стал completed).\n","example":"2025-08-28T20:15:00Z","readOnly":true}},"title":"Task"}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
